humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is metastases in 1 to 3 axillary lymph nodes (1/2), which corresponds to N1 according to Rule 12. The exact number of lymph nodes with metastases is 1 out of a total of 6 sampled lymph nodes, as stated in the AJCC/UICC stage (pT2N1aMX).

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has 1 out of 6 sampled lymph nodes with metastatic adenocarcinoma (1/6), which corresponds to N1 stage. The total number of positive lymph nodes is 1, and the largest metastasis diameter is 2.1 mm. There is no extranodal extension.
